summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of North Broadway from the north line of Oakland Addition to the south line of Broadway second add, et al. in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 20558, creating Local Improvement District No. 2046 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
